column4: so i first think did is sudo su and then i set a password with passwd
omg bullshit
as i said get a root-console
wih sudo su or sudo -i
and then set a password with passwd
me again with another mplayer problem ;D
on playing a .avi file i got the following error-msg
alsa-space: xrun of at least 0.119 msecs. resetting stream0.5% 6 0 95%
and the sounds have many msec breaks
has anyone a solution?
is your CPU fast enough?
oh, that should be more than fast enough. Try using OSS output on mplayer.
how?
mplayer -ao oss file.avi
maybe the file is messed up. I've seen some that mplayer really chokes on.
try a different player (xine, totem, vlc or somehting)
maybe, although my much slower machine could play movies without the nvidia drivers.
but trying to play the file CPU goes to 100% and then videos lags
sounds like the file is too big/complex for your CPU. More likely it's broken somehow. I see them from time to time, with the same behaviour you described.
yeah, try a different player.
it's quite likely the file is a bit broken.
